content: I don't have personal preferences. however, it really depends on what you are interested in. if you are interested in trying street food, then gwangjang market would be a good choice. if you are looking for korean traditional crafts and souvenirs, then insadong market would be a good option. if you want to try seafood, then noryangjin fish market would be a great choice. overall, all of these traditional markets offer unique experiences and are definitely worth a visit during your trip to seoul.
